mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_INFO_NO , A.MEMBER_ADDRESS , A.MEMBER_ACCOUNT_NO , A.MEMBER_ACCOUNT_BANK , A.ACCOUNT_HOST , A.MEMBER_FILEATTACHMENT , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.MEMBER_WORK_CONTRACT , A.MEMBER_NO FROM BB_MEMBER_INFO A WHERE A.MEMBER_INFO_NO = 1
SELECT MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_PWD , EMAIL , PHONE FROM BB_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = 1

SELECT D.DEPT_NAME
FROM BB_MEMBER A JOIN BB_MODIFY_DEPT B ON ( A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) JOIN BB_DEPT D ON( B.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE) WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = 1
